issue.title: trashed policy taken into account by proxy
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

A policy that is trashed is taken into account by the proxy, it should not.

We could remove the trash feature and add a direct delete feature for policies.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

I agree, I do not see the need of the trash feature.
Delete is for me OK
